channel.title: South Beta Podcast
channel.description: This is one man's journey to untangle the knot that is the climbing community, with is co-host who occasionally knows the answers to his climbing related questions.
channel.itunes:author: Zack & Evan

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta Season 3, Episode 1: Joshing Around Episode
item.itunes:summary: We were guests in a friends house so we decided to record an episode. This being our first episode of 2020 and our first episode in nearly a year of recording, we spent much of the time getting back into the swing of things. Hope you all enjoy it.
item.description: We were guests in a friends house so we decided to record an episode. This being our first episode of 2020 and our first episode in nearly a year of recording, we spent much of the time getting back into the swing of things. Hope you all enjoy it.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta Season 2, Episode 2: Zack Joins El Cap
item.itunes:summary: This was recorded in Febuary 2019 during SF Beer week. We talk about Zack joining the El Cap team and the new Belmont acroyoga class. Super exciting. Was supposed to be shared back then. Sorry for the delay.
item.description: This was recorded in Febuary 2019 during SF Beer week. We talk about Zack joining the El Cap team and the new Belmont acroyoga class. Super exciting. Was supposed to be shared back then. Sorry for the delay.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta Season 2, Episode 1: Recap
item.itunes:summary: This is almost like a year recap episode. We get back to chatting about various climbing related topics. Enjoy at your own risk.
item.description: This is almost like a year recap episode. We get back to chatting about various climbing related topics. Enjoy at your own risk.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 15: Projecting
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we welcome back our special guest Bridget to ask Dr. Evan Pearce some super special questions about how he projects a climb. Humor ensues.
item.description: In this episode we welcome back our special guest Bridget to ask Dr. Evan Pearce some super special questions about how he projects a climb. Humor ensues.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 14: Earth Treks Episode
item.itunes:summary: Earth Treks and Planet Granite merged late last year and we finally have a chance to ask our questions and Evan does his best to answer them.
item.description: Earth Treks and Planet Granite merged late last year and we finally have a chance to ask our questions and Evan does his best to answer them.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 13: Big Walls 2018
item.itunes:summary: After a long break between episodes we talk about what it would take to do the bill wall project we have been planning for 2018. There is also a bunch of PG news and some other catch up stuff.
item.description: After a long break between episodes we talk about what it would take to do the bill wall project we have been planning for 2018. There is also a bunch of PG news and some other catch up stuff.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 12: Special Guest Justin Vitcov
item.itunes:summary: We invite our friend Justin to come in and talk about how he has progressed in a multi decade long climbing career. How has he kept himself engaged in the sport? How has goals shifted over time? Listen and find out.
item.description: We invite our friend Justin to come in and talk about how he has progressed in a multi decade long climbing career. How has he kept himself engaged in the sport? How has goals shifted over time? Listen and find out.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 11: The Catch Up Episode
item.itunes:summary: We had no real content to talk about in this episode so we just bantered for an hour and half about random stuff, concluding with a giant discussion about LeBron James and Steph Curry. Listen at your own risk.
item.description: We had no real content to talk about in this episode so we just bantered for an hour and half about random stuff, concluding with a giant discussion about LeBron James and Steph Curry. Listen at your own risk.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 10: The Push and talking with climbers
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about Tommy Caldwell and the book he just released called the push. We talk about the event at Planet Granite where Tommy came to speak and talk about the polite way to talk to professional climbers, though I'm not sure we reach any definitive conclusion.
item.description: In this episode we talk about Tommy Caldwell and the book he just released called the push. We talk about the event at Planet Granite where Tommy came to speak and talk about the polite way to talk to professional climbers, though I'm not sure we reach any definitive conclusion.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 09: Pushing Limits on Sport Climbing W/ Bridget
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about the staff competition and how great it was. We also have a special guest Bridget that explains how she was able to push through her personal fears and improve her level on sport climbing.
item.description: In this episode we talk about the staff competition and how great it was. We also have a special guest Bridget that explains how she was able to push through her personal fears and improve her level on sport climbing.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 08: Lead Climbing Part 0
item.itunes:summary: This episode is a little bit ranty. We start with the idea of talking about lead climbing but end up hitting a very wide range of topics from our spirit animals to acro yoga and back to climbing again. There is som trash talking about the upcoming staff competition as well as talking about the Ohm, a new resistive climbing device to help compensate for my weight.
item.description: This episode is a little bit ranty. We start with the idea of talking about lead climbing but end up hitting a very wide range of topics from our spirit animals to acro yoga and back to climbing again. There is som trash talking about the upcoming staff competition as well as talking about the Ohm, a new resistive climbing device to help compensate for my weight.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 07: Utah
item.itunes:summary: A random road trip happened over the President's Day weekend. Evan and I talk about our adventure in Utah. We continuely mock the audience size of our podcast.
item.description: A random road trip happened over the President's Day weekend. Evan and I talk about our adventure in Utah. We continuely mock the audience size of our podcast.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 06: Bouldering
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we delve into the particular aspact of climbing known as bouldering. We talk about history of boulder, training, and provide some tips for improving your bouldering abilities.
item.description: In this episode we delve into the particular aspact of climbing known as bouldering. We talk about history of boulder, training, and provide some tips for improving your bouldering abilities.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 05: Finger Issues
item.itunes:summary: It's been a long time since we've uploaded an episode, but here's a new one. We have decided to shift the format up a bit and talk a bit more about finger issues and various other climbing performance suggestions before we go into our climbing updates. Hopefully the new format will provide a bit more structure and maybe fewer tangents.
item.description: It's been a long time since we've uploaded an episode, but here's a new one. We have decided to shift the format up a bit and talk a bit more about finger issues and various other climbing performance suggestions before we go into our climbing updates. Hopefully the new format will provide a bit more structure and maybe fewer tangents.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta 04: Types of climbing part 1
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we first introduce Claire VanGo, where we host this episode. The intro has been updated to better stress what we cover, this is a personal exploration through the climbing community and climbing lifestyle. We start covering the different types of climbing but run out of clock. Consider this episode to be continued.
item.description: In this episode we first introduce Claire VanGo, where we host this episode. The intro has been updated to better stress what we cover, this is a personal exploration through the climbing community and climbing lifestyle. We start covering the different types of climbing but run out of clock. Consider this episode to be continued.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta: 03
item.itunes:summary: This is our third installment of our South Beta podcast. We talk about various topics including our outdoor climbing adventures, the three stitch pitch, and seeing Alex Honnald from a far.
item.description: This is our third installment of our South Beta podcast. We talk about various topics including our outdoor climbing adventures, the three stitch pitch, and seeing Alex Honnald from a far.

item.itunes:author: Zack & Evan
item.title: South Beta: 02
item.description: Episode Number 2 of the new South Beta Podcast.
